reviewText: thought that it was some sort of documentary not just interview footage,you can just watch this on YouTube and it's not really revealing footage it's just random questions that they have repeatedly been asked
This is a good collection of personal interviews with the boys most of which are new to me. I would recommend this DVD to any fan and believe it to be among the best DVDs available about 1D
This was a compilation of bits and pieces of TV and radio interviews the boys have done. A true Directioner has likely already seen or heard all of this.  I was very disappointed.
